doc:
Linda Eder https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linda_Eder 0 Linda Eder (; born February 3, 1961) is an American singer and actress. She made her Broadway debut in the musical Jekyll Hyde, originating the role of Lucy, for which she was nominated for the Drama Desk Award. Eder has performed in concert halls across the country including Carnegie Hall and Radio City Musical Hall. She has released her 18th solo album in 2018. Linda_Eder ( ; born February_3_,_1961 ) is an_American_singer_and_actress . She made her_Broadway_debut in the_musical_Jekyll_ , originating the_role of Lucy , for which she was_nominated for the_Drama_Desk_Award . Eder has_performed in concert_halls across the_country including Carnegie_Hall and Radio_City_Musical_Hall . She has_released her_18th_solo_album in 2018 .
